quote: I hope you will go out and let stories happen to you, and that you will work them, water them with your blood and tears and laughter 'til they bloom, 'til you yourself burst into bloom.
quote_letters: I HOPE YOU WILL GO OUT AND LET STORIES HAPPEN TO YOU AND THAT YOU WILL WORK THEM WATER THEM WITH YOUR BLOOD AND TEARS AND LAUGHTER TIL THEY BLOOM TIL YOU YOURSELF BURST INTO BLOOM
